That means that those scripts are executed right after each other.
Isso significa que esses scripts são executados logo após o outro.
That means that those scripts are executed right after each other.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/tutorials/csharpintermediate/async-scripts.md
If one particular sync script would take 1 second to complete, our game would freeze that 1 second, until the update loop is complete.
Se um script de sincronização em particular levaria 1 segundo para completar, nosso jogo congelaria esse 1 segundo, até que o loop de atualização esteja completo.
If one particular sync script would take 1 second to complete, our game would freeze that 1 second, until the update loop is complete.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/tutorials/csharpintermediate/async-scripts.md
All of the previously made Sync scripts can be made into an Async script.
Todos os scripts de Sincronização anteriores podem ser feitos em um script Async.
All of the previously made Sync scripts can be made into an Async script.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/tutorials/csharpintermediate/async-scripts.md
With Async scripts we can perform heavy duty operations or reach out to an api without it freezing our application.
Com scripts Async podemos executar operações de serviço pesado ou chegar a um api sem ele congelar nossa aplicação.
With Async scripts we can perform heavy duty operations or reach out to an api without it freezing our application.
/D:/repos/stride-translations/pt-BR/source/tutorials/csharpintermediate/async-scripts.md
A game can be made entirely with either Sync or Async scripts, or a combination of them both.
Um jogo pode ser feito inteiramente com scripts Sync ou Async, ou uma combinação deles ambos.
A game can be made entirely with either Sync or Async scripts, or a combination of them both.
